entities.name: she
entities.description: The person being referred to is a female character, likely someone of authority or importance.

entities.name: yeh
entities.description: The group being referred to is the speaker and possibly others, as indicated by the use of 'yeh' (a colloquial or informal term for 'you').

entities.name: hut
entities.description: The hut is a physical location where the speaker resides, and it is mentioned as a place to avoid in the evenings.

relationships.description: The speaker warns that if 'she' catches them, it will put their necks on the line, indicating a threat or consequence of being caught.
The speaker advises 'yeh' to abstain from walking down to his hut in the evenings, indicating a desire to avoid the location.
